dasp5000.domain.audiocontainers

Interface AudioContainer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MonoAudio, StereoAudio

    public interface AudioContainer
    An interface that all the classes that store information about audio must implement.
    Author:
    Petri Kallio

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AudioAnalysis getAudioAnalysis()
      Get the audio's AudioAnalysis object
      AudioFormat getAudioFormat()
      Get the audio's AudioFormat object.
      int getBitsPerAudioSample()
      Get the amount of bits used to store a single audio sample.
      DynamicArray<Integer>[] getChannels()
      Get the AudioContainer's audio channel's samples as an array of DynamicArrays.
      DynamicArray<Integer> getLeftChannel()
      Get the left channel's data.
      int getNumberOfChannels()
      Get the number of channels of the AudioContainer
      DynamicArray<Integer> getRightChannel()
      Get the right channel's data.
      float getSampleRate()
      Get the amount of samples stored to record one second of audio.
      boolean isBigEndian()
      Get the endianness of the audio data.
      void setAudioAnalysis(AudioAnalysis audioAnalysis)
      Set the AudioAnalysis object of the AudioContainer object
      void setChannels(DynamicArray<Integer>[] channels)
      Set the AudioContainer object's audio channel data by passing an array of DynamicArrays.
      void setLeftChannel(DynamicArray<Integer> audioData)
      Set the left channel's data.
      void setRightChannel(DynamicArray<Integer> audioData)
      Set the right channel's data.

        Returns:

      • isBigEndian

        boolean isBigEndian()
        Get the endianness of the audio data.
        Returns:
        true if big-endian, false if little-endian
